revised_title: Thermo-Electric and Chemico-Electric Action of Metals in Electrolytes
tldr: The author investigates the thermo-electric and chemico-electric behavior of metals in various electrolytes, examining the effects of temperature, liquid strength, and chemical composition on their properties. The study reveals that the strength of the liquid has a significant impact on the thermo-electric and chemico-electric potential of metals, while the rate of corrosion varies depending on the metal and the electrolyte used.
